TopicTitle: Rover lights are not what is expected.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 9 3900X 12-Core Processor | GPU: Radeon RX6950XT | RAM: 32

 

The lights for rovers should be a bit more wide and or throw farther it has been difficult to get lights that actually allow you to drive around in darkness.  Perhaps a longer throw distance?   Also when just looking at this the crew cabin has a glow but that does not seem to effect the ground. I would think there would be some reflected light.  The ability to control the angle of the lights after launch would also be helpful.
